infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SeedSync needs access to your camera to take photos of crops and detect diseases.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SeedSync needs access to your photo library to upload crop images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: SeedSync needs your location to find nearby FPOs and provide weather information.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SeedSync to access your camera to take photos of crops and detect diseases.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow SeedSync to access your photos to upload crop images.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow SeedSync to use your location to find nearby FPOs and provide weather information.
